name: South Pass
description:
What would you do if the internet went out? What if it wasn't coming back... ever?
On a certain day in the small mountain town of South Pass the people are abandoned by the Internet service providers.
The cell tower breaks down and it's decided that repairs would cost too much and that the people are not profitable.
Fortunately the lack of cell signals open up the air waves to interdimensional travel and a really chill space dog shows up to show you how to groove.

- Your controller is an instrument!
- Learn to play four unique sound generators!
- Each Instrument has a unique game mode!
- Four Characters to choose from!
- Live the same day from four perspectives!
- Play twelve songs!
- Get your friends together and jam out!
- Main story under one hour for ease of play!
- Mini-Games!
